ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 368
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone heard if there really will be a tinkering update with Luclin?  I was thinking with the new familiar spells for wizards that tinkered pets might no
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone heard if there really will be a tinkering update with Luclin? I
was thinking with the new familiar spells for wizards that tinkered pets
might no longer be a verboten addition.

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Gazamel Prime [mailto:gazamel@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2001 1:23 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 368


This item existed in beta, but was removed =/

Gazamel

> jeweler made item and
> > combining or 2) putting the gemcutter in a
> tinkerer's toolbox with a
> > jeweler made item and combining would either 1)
> produce a gem, or 2) will
> > not combine. Worth a shot.. wish I had one.
